content.rendered:
Salary: up to $47/hr based on experience and location

Location: 100% Remote but must live in AK, CA, MT, NM, OR, TX or WA

Job Description:
– An exciting Inpatient Coding opportunity responsible for ensuring accurate and compliant coding of acute care services
– Seeking candidates with a “can-do” attitude, passionate about HIM/Coding and interested in continuing to learn/grow as a Coder
– Communicate effectively and professionally with all levels of staff within the facility and health system

Requirements:
– At least 1 year of Inpatient Coding experience for a hospital with at least 300 beds
– Must live in one of the following States:
• Alaska, California, Montana, New Mexico, Oregon, Texas or Washington
– RHIA, RHIT and/or CCS
– Consistent work history, not seeking candidates who make frequent employer changes
– EPIC/3M 360 CAC experience desired
– Open to working in a Union environment

Benefits:
– This is a wonderful Inpatient Coding opportunity working for a large and well-respected Health System
– Flexible schedule, Monday-Friday
– up to $47/hr dependent on geographical location (cost of living) and years of experience
– A great opportunity for an Inpatient Coder interested in being a part of one of the best Coding/Auditing teams in the world!
– Full-time, stable, permanent opportunity working for a large health system
– Great benefits!
– Laptop, docking station and dual monitors provided by employer
– No COVID Vaccine required

meta._job_location: 100% Remote; must live in AK, CA, MT, NM, OR, TX or WA
